# PostHog skills

Official PostHog skills auto-generated from [PostHog/context-mill](https://github.com/PostHog/context-mill). These skills provide integration guides, feature flag implementations, logging setups, and more across 30+ frameworks and languages.

**Do not edit these files directly** — they are wiped and replaced on each context-mill release.

## Categories

| Category | Description | Skills |
|----------|-------------|--------|
| [Integration](integration/) | Framework integration guides | — |
| [Feature flags](feature-flags/) | Feature flag implementation guides | — |
| [Logs](logs/) | Logging setup guides | — |
| [LLM analytics](llm-analytics/) | LLM observability guides | — |
| [Tools](tools/) | PostHog tools and features | — |

*Skill counts will be populated after the first context-mill sync.*
